rdf:Description.dc:description: "Research and writing: Peggy Garritty ... [et. al] ; Production and design: Innovisions Consulting Group Ltd." --Cover p.3.
Reprint of workbook prepared for the Budget Roundtable held at Red Deer College on March 29-30, 1993 together with summary views expressed there.
UA copy donated by the Provincial Health Authorities of Alberta.
